title: Back to Mr & Mrs
description: Cade and Melanie-- high school prom king and queen-- the golden couple Twenty years on, the reunion's looming, and Melanie Matthews must let the world know that the dream is no longer true... ." Somewhere along their journey Cade lost sight of what really mattered. He let work take first place in his life and lost the one person who lit up his world. Now he's determined to show Melanie that he can be the man she's always wanted, the husband she always needed... and win back her heart.
author: Shirley Jump
